SEARCH

Class Book

java.lang.Object
Book
public class Book extends Object
Represents a book in the library system. Each book has a title, author, ISBN, and borrowing status. Provides methods to borrow, return, and calculate fines.
Version:
1.0
Author:
hoor

      Gets the author of the book.
      Returns:

      public String getIsbn()
      Gets the ISBN of the book in lowercase.
      Returns:
      the ISBN string

    • isBorrowed

      public boolean isBorrowed()
      Checks if the book is currently borrowed.
      Returns:
      true if borrowed, false otherwise

    • getDueDate

      public LocalDate getDueDate()
      Gets the due date for returning the book.
      Returns:
      the due date, or null if not borrowed

    • getBorrowedBy

      public String getBorrowedBy()
      Gets the ID of the member who borrowed the book.
      Returns:
      the member ID, or null if not borrowed

    • borrow

      public void borrow(String memberId)
      Marks the book as borrowed by a member. Sets the due date to 28 days from today.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the ID of the member borrowing the book

    • returnBook

      public void returnBook()
      Marks the book as returned. Resets borrowed status, due date, and borrower ID.

    • setDueDate

      public void setDueDate(LocalDate dueDate)
      Sets a custom due date for the book.
      Parameters:
      dueDate - the new due date

    • getFinePerDay

      public int getFinePerDay()
      Gets the fine charged per overdue day.
      Returns:
      fine amount per day (10 NIS)

    • getLoanPeriodDays

      public int getLoanPeriodDays()
      Gets the loan period in days.
      Returns:
      loan period (28 days)

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the book. Includes ISBN, title, author, and borrowing status.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      formatted string with book details
